instructions:
Call Summarization 2

For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You may write notes about each of the stories in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the story.

After each story has been told, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to a question where you will be asked to choose the alternative that best summarizes that story.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

  1. You can use your mouse to select your answers
  2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.
  3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

mcqQuestions.questionText: Based upon the caller’s information, how many men were in the pick up truck when it left the Store’s parking lot?

options.text: this information was not indicated by the caller

mcqQuestions.questionText: What important information did the caller say about the man who rented the movie?

options.text: The man offered to pay for the movie using a traveler’s check.
The man’s driver’s license was expired.
The man’s credit card was expired.
The man who rented the movie was the driver of the pick up truck.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, at least one of the men who came into the store lives on:
The pick up truck was described by the caller as:

options.text: Leaving the scene at a high rate of speed.

mcqQuestions.questionText: The pick up truck was last seen by the caller traveling _________ on Maple Street.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Woman choking on chicken bone stuck in her throat.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, his daughter is _________ years old.
According to the caller, the daughter’s boyfriend’s car is a:
The caller stated that the neighbor who called him and told him about the party lives at:
The caller said the name of his daughter’s boyfriend is:

options.text: his daughter had been previously arrested for dealing drugs.
His daughter had been previously arrested for being drunk.
His daughter’s boyfriend had been previously arrested for dealing drugs.
His daughter’s boyfriend had been previously arrested for being drunk.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Man announces he will begin shooting at people in 10 minutes.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, one of the vehicles involved in the accident is ________ in color.
The caller was using ________ to report the accident.
According to the caller, the female driver is _________ years of age.
According to the caller, the female driver was dressed in (a) blue:

captions.CS131:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.120 --> 00:00:02.251
Hi. My name is Charlene Green.

2
00:00:02.490 --> 00:00:06.710
Charlene C H A R L E N E.

4
00:00:07.050 --> 00:00:10.320
GREEN G R E E N.

6
00:00:10.560 --> 00:00:12.140
You know like the color green.

7
00:00:12.570 --> 00:00:16.370
I work at the store on 3 7 2 2 Apple

9
00:00:16.920 --> 00:00:18.965
A P P L E

10
00:00:19.410 --> 00:00:24.350
in Eastvale E A S T V A L E.

13
00:00:25.020 --> 00:00:25.910
I'm scared.

14
00:00:26.190 --> 00:00:28.040
I only worked here for three days.

15
00:00:28.290 --> 00:00:30.120
I'm afraid to call the owner because
he's

16
00:00:30.121 --> 00:00:31.280
probably asleep.

17
00:00:31.530 --> 00:00:32.870
He works so hard.

18
00:00:33.150 --> 00:00:34.880
There were three guys here you know.

19
00:00:34.950 --> 00:00:36.320
They came to rent a movie.

20
00:00:36.420 --> 00:00:38.060
Boy were they drunk you know.

21
00:00:38.160 --> 00:00:39.630
They wanted to pay for the movie

22
00:00:39.631 --> 00:00:40.940
with a personal check.

23
00:00:41.190 --> 00:00:43.109
I told them my boss that I couldn't
rent

24
00:00:43.110 --> 00:00:44.940
anyone a movie unless they had a
current

25
00:00:44.941 --> 00:00:45.800
credit card.

26
00:00:46.110 --> 00:00:47.190
But they got so mad

27
00:00:47.191 --> 00:00:49.100
and the guy who wanted to rent the
movie

28
00:00:49.200 --> 00:00:51.470
said he only had an expired credit
card.

29
00:00:51.540 --> 00:00:53.320
So I rented him the movie anyway.

30
00:00:53.700 --> 00:00:55.649
But I wrote down the guy's driver's
license

31
00:00:55.650 --> 00:00:57.540
number and wrote it on the movie
rental

32
00:00:57.541 --> 00:00:58.090
slip.

33
00:00:58.470 --> 00:01:00.640
At least his driver's license was
correct.

34
00:01:00.870 --> 00:01:05.449
It is T 4 1 2 4 8 9 5

37
00:01:05.880 --> 00:01:07.940
and I saw this on the license too.

38
00:01:08.100 --> 00:01:09.740
He lives on Maple Lane.

39
00:01:10.050 --> 00:01:11.270
They were so drunk.

40
00:01:11.340 --> 00:01:13.170
Look all three got into their empty

41
00:01:13.171 --> 00:01:14.480
old orange pickup

42
00:01:14.580 --> 00:01:16.470
and just left heading south down
Maple

43
00:01:16.471 --> 00:01:18.260
Street when it left the parking lot.

44
00:01:18.780 --> 00:01:20.870
Their pickup has license plate

45
00:01:20.880 --> 00:01:24.680
4 X U V 9 9 2.

47
00:01:25.080 --> 00:01:26.970
I'm really really afraid I'll get in
trouble

48
00:01:26.971 --> 00:01:28.280
for running them the movie.

49
00:01:28.350 --> 00:01:29.030
What shall I do?
captions.CS132:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.360 --> 00:00:06.140
Yes. This is Shelly Drake
S H E L L Y D R A K E.

4
00:00:07.230 --> 00:00:08.309
I never call you guys

5
00:00:08.310 --> 00:00:10.220
but I felt that I just had to now.

6
00:00:10.560 --> 00:00:12.389
I'm calling from my mother's house
at

7
00:00:12.390 --> 00:00:16.925
3 5 7 9 Elm E L M. in Valley Dream

9
00:00:17.210 --> 00:00:19.110
V A L L E Y

10
00:00:19.540 --> 00:00:21.595
D R E A M.

11
00:00:21.830 --> 00:00:23.820
The neighbor lady in the house
across the street

12
00:00:23.821 --> 00:00:26.060
from mine at 3 5 8 2 Elm

13
00:00:26.510 --> 00:00:28.380
call me to tell me that she thought
there was something

14
00:00:28.381 --> 00:00:29.990
fishy going on at my house.

15
00:00:30.750 --> 00:00:32.480
Her name is Tommy Drake.

16
00:00:32.940 --> 00:00:34.370
I know small world.

17
00:00:35.430 --> 00:00:36.590
No we're not related.

18
00:00:37.040 --> 00:00:38.910
So as I was saying this neighbor

19
00:00:38.911 --> 00:00:41.330
told me my 14 year old daughter Jean

20
00:00:41.460 --> 00:00:43.350
is having a party at her house while
we are

21
00:00:43.351 --> 00:00:43.910
away.

22
00:00:44.370 --> 00:00:45.180
She is real pretty

23
00:00:45.181 --> 00:00:46.440
with long blond hair.

24
00:00:46.960 --> 00:00:48.930
Well my neighbor said she was
throwing a really big

25
00:00:48.931 --> 00:00:49.710
party with liquor

26
00:00:49.711 --> 00:00:50.450
and everything.

27
00:00:50.970 --> 00:00:51.980
I don't know what to do.

28
00:00:52.110 --> 00:00:54.000
She was arrested last year for being
drunk at

29
00:00:54.001 --> 00:00:54.680
a party.

30
00:00:55.170 --> 00:00:57.030
The people next door had a big party
last

31
00:00:57.031 --> 00:00:58.910
year and their place got really
trashed.

32
00:00:59.340 --> 00:00:59.900
Oh yeah.

33
00:01:00.210 --> 00:01:02.190
My phone number where I'm calling

34
00:01:02.191 --> 00:01:06.140
from is 5 3 2 8 6 5 4.

36
00:01:07.050 --> 00:01:08.970
I especially don't want her 17 year
old

37
00:01:08.971 --> 00:01:10.950
drug dealing boyfriend Paul at my

38
00:01:10.951 --> 00:01:11.570
house.

39
00:01:11.880 --> 00:01:13.895
He probably knows me drives a yellow
Datson.

40
00:01:14.950 --> 00:01:16.700
Wait. My neighbor told me

41
00:01:16.890 --> 00:01:18.170
the vehicle VIN number.

42
00:01:18.450 --> 00:01:27.932
Oh yeah it's 2 M T E U 6 4 L P W 5 5 9 2 I.

46
00:01:28.620 --> 00:01:29.550
If you see him

47
00:01:29.551 --> 00:01:31.470
or any of his buddies hanging around
my house

48
00:01:31.471 --> 00:01:32.550
I want you to arrest them all

49
00:01:32.551 --> 00:01:33.680
and tow their cars away

50
00:01:34.280 --> 00:01:36.180
and you can arrest that no good
daughter of

51
00:01:36.181 --> 00:01:37.030
remind too.

52
00:01:37.350 --> 00:01:39.359
Oh yeah. If you see my green Subaru

53
00:01:39.360 --> 00:01:41.490
parked near the house please don't
tow that
captions.CS133:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.180 --> 00:00:02.270
My name is Elissa Martinez.

2
00:00:02.490 --> 00:00:07.250
Elissa E L I S S A Martinez

4
00:00:07.380 --> 00:00:10.016
M A R T I N E Z.

6
00:00:10.920 --> 00:00:12.405
I live in the village of Marley

7
00:00:12.870 --> 00:00:19.190
M A R L E Y at 8 5 7 6 1 Lincoln

10
00:00:19.410 --> 00:00:22.563
L I N C O L N.

12
00:00:23.250 --> 00:00:25.139
Have you had any reports of
accidents

13
00:00:25.140 --> 00:00:26.503
near the county fairgrounds?

14
00:00:27.060 --> 00:00:28.920
I was picking up my children after
their

15
00:00:28.921 --> 00:00:30.020
little league game

16
00:00:30.150 --> 00:00:32.070
and I saw this accident happened
right in

17
00:00:32.071 --> 00:00:32.870
front of me.

18
00:00:33.000 --> 00:00:34.160
It was terrible.

19
00:00:34.290 --> 00:00:35.270
Can you hear me.

20
00:00:35.580 --> 00:00:37.630
This damn cell phone never works
right.

21
00:00:37.820 --> 00:00:39.720
Okay. These two cars crashed when
they

22
00:00:39.721 --> 00:00:41.640
were drag racing on the dirt road
leading

23
00:00:41.641 --> 00:00:42.860
up to Smith's farm.

24
00:00:43.140 --> 00:00:44.970
The driver of the white car has a
pretty

25
00:00:44.971 --> 00:00:46.370
bad cut on his leg.

26
00:00:46.620 --> 00:00:48.750
The driver of the other car wasn't
even injured

27
00:00:48.751 --> 00:00:50.510
because she was wearing her
seatbelt.

28
00:00:50.760 --> 00:00:51.750
I know her family

29
00:00:51.751 --> 00:00:53.910
and she is one year older than my 14

30
00:00:53.911 --> 00:00:54.890
year old daughter.

31
00:00:55.350 --> 00:00:57.330
I saw her as she ran away from the
wreck

32
00:00:57.331 --> 00:00:58.340
into the field.

33
00:00:58.650 --> 00:01:00.600
I tell you she looks a lot older
than she

34
00:01:00.601 --> 00:01:02.750
really is dressed in those blue
shorts

35
00:01:02.970 --> 00:01:04.790
but her passenger who was in the
back

36
00:01:04.791 --> 00:01:06.899
seat. He's really a big guy.

37
00:01:06.900 --> 00:01:08.990
Looks like he could really use some
help.

38
00:01:09.420 --> 00:01:10.800
He's bleeding from his ears

39
00:01:10.801 --> 00:01:12.590
and he's really screaming for help.

40
00:01:12.870 --> 00:01:14.870
Maybe you can hear him in the
background.

41
00:01:15.150 --> 00:01:15.980
Never mind.

42
00:01:16.200 --> 00:01:18.180
Oh yeah I can see the license plate
of one

43
00:01:18.181 --> 00:01:23.270
of the cars and it is 7 5 9 L S V.

46
00:01:23.970 --> 00:01:25.969
These damn kids are always in a
hurry to get

47
00:01:25.970 --> 00:01:26.780
someplace

48
00:01:26.910 --> 00:01:29.130
and never seem to be concentrating
on their driving

49
00:01:29.131 --> 00:01:30.170
like they should be.

50
00:01:30.840 --> 00:01:32.730
I am glad my kids aren't old enough
to

51
00:01:32.731 --> 00:01:33.380
drive.

52
00:01:33.720 --> 00:01:36.020
Hey I have to see if they need help.

53
00:01:36.150 --> 00:01:40.100
You can call me back at 7 3 5 8 1 9 7

55
00:01:40.101 --> 00:01:41.940
if you need to get a hold

56
00:01:41.941 --> 00:01:43.400
of me in the next half hour.

57
00:01:43.530 --> 00:01:45.560
Please hurry and send someone quick.
